tgt_original: tathatāgāmbhīryārthamāha |  tat kiṃ manyase subhūte tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathateti |  bodhisattva iti śeṣaḥ |

avikalpajñānaviṣayopetatvādāha |  tathaiva bhagavan sthāsyati yathā tathateti |  traiyadhvikabodhisattvānāṃ tathatāvadavasthāne'  nityā tathatā syāditi cedāha |  tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yadi tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā tadā mā kūṭasthābhūditi |
no hīdamiti |  anantaraṃ traiyadhvikavastunirodhanirākaraṇādavidyamānatvenābhāvo naiva nirudhyate |  māyopamatā tarhi nirudhyata ityāha |
